about.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with a focus on the Frontend. I am passionate about programming and literature. I search for intellectual challenges and projects that bring value to society.

projects.title: Restaurant App
projects.description: This full stack app is a Restaurant system Demo: in the frontend-client UI, the user can see the menu options and submit an order (via orders API written in Golang), that will be stored in the mongo database. In addition, in frontend-backoffice, another user can update the status of these orders and also handle the menu options (products API).
projects.techs: Techs: docker-compose, Golang, mongoDB, ReactJS, react-redux, formik

projects.title: Appointments Demo
projects.description: The user completes a multi step form and schedules an appointment.

projects.title: Real Estate Demo
projects.description: The user can search, sort, filter and select real estate offers. There are also details of each real estate, such as pictures and google map locations.

projects.title: This Resume
projects.description: The user can read information about my personal data, developer skills, projects, experience and education.

projects.title: Dungeon Game
projects.description: The user can play a Dungeon Game. He can walk on the board, pick up weapons, potions, fight against enemies and advance to the next level.
projects.techs: Techs: HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Javascript and ReactJS.
